subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Already an elder statesman at 27, and with an N.B.A. championship, LeBron James is embracing his role as a leader on the United States men’s basketball team.
snippet: Already an elder statesman at 27, and with an N.B.A. championship, LeBron James is embracing his role as a leader on the United States men’s basketball team.
